questions: Why do I need a Personal Accident Policy?
answers: A personal accident policy provides a lump sum amount in case of an accident or disability. The compensation shields you from the financial burden that you or your family may incur due to such an eventuality, because accidents don’t come scheduled, they happen anytime and anywhere.
An accident means a sudden, unforeseen and involuntary event caused by external, visible and violent means.

questions: Are the benefits available if there is an accident outside India?
answers: Yes, this policy offers worldwide coverage.

The policy covers accidental death and disability - total and partial, caused due to an accident. It also covers the cost of road ambulance, funeral expenses, repatriation of remains, modification of vehicle/home, and compassionate visit in case of an accident. It also offers education and orphan benefit in and a cumulative bonus in case of no claims in the policy.

questions: Are there any optional covers under the policy?
answers:
Yes, the following optional covers are available on payment of additional premium and basis the terms and conditions of each cover.

  • Temporary Total Disablement (TTD)
  • Accidental in-patient Hospitalization Cover
  • Broken Bones Benefit
  • Coma Benefit
  • Burn Benefit
  • Accidental Medical Expenses
  • Adventure Sports Cover
  • Worldwide Emergency Assistance Services (including Air Ambulance)
  • EMI Protect
  • Loan Protect
  • Wellness coach

questions: Is there an age limit for opting for a Personal Accident plan?
answers: The minimum entry age is 5 years and the maximum entry age is 65 years.

questions: What is the basis of determining the sum insured under Personal Accident plan?
answers: Nature of occupation and income are the main factors which determine the sum insured. For more details, please consult your sales advisor.

questions: Will I be able to cover my non-earning spouse, children and parents under the policy?
answers:
Yes, your non-earning children and parents are eligible for the below Sum Insured value:

  1. Non-earning Spouse / Parent/Parent in laws – 100% of Proposer’s Basic cover sum insured/eligibility or 30L whichever is lower. 
  2. Children/Student – 100% of Proposer’s Basic cover sum insured/eligibility or 15L whichever is lower.

questions: How long is my policy valid for?
answers: We offer you an option of buying the policy for 1 year, 2 years and 3 years’ term. You can renew your policy at the end of policy term.

questions: Will I get a discount on a 2 or a 3-year policy tenure?
answers: A long term discount of 7.5% and 10% on premium is applicable on selecting a 2 and 3 years’ policy term respectively. This will apply only in case of Single Premium Policies.

questions: Until what age can I renew my Policy?
answers: We offer you a lifetime renewability for this health plan, subject to payment of premium and fulfilment of other policy conditions.
Yes, you can request for enhancement of Sum insured at the time of renewal. However, the enhancement is subject to underwriting decision.

questions: Can I nominate my child a minor to receive the benefit in case of any Accidental death?
answers: Yes, in such case guardian of the nominee has to be provided.

questions: What are the premium payment options under this policy?
answers: You can choose to buy this Policy by paying a single premium, or you can choose premium payment on instalment basis. Monthly/quarterly/semi-annual instalment options are available for Policies with Policy Period of 1 year.

questions: How should I claim benefit under the Personal accident plan?
answers:
You need to submit the claims documents to us within 30 days of occurrence of the event with the following documents:

  • Completed Claim Form
  • Photo ID and Age proof
  • Attested copy of medico legal certificate copy / first information report copy / Panchnama
  • Copies of consultation letters detailing the treatment taken immediately after Accident
  • Radiological investigation reports like X ray, CT scan, MRI etc
  • Additional documents as required for Specific Benefits

questions: Whom can I purchase the policy for?
answers: You can purchase the policy for yourself and include your spouse up to four children, and yours and your spouse’s parents.

questions: I want to cover my 4 family members. Do I get any discounts?
answers: You can avail a discount of 10% on premium on covering 2 or more family members in a single policy.
